hero: Partner with Elite Capital to access high-growth, community-focused developments to achieve superior risk-adjusted returns.

aboutsub.text: As a DFSA-authorised private equity firm, we provide access to investment in a carefully curated pipeline of premium real estate investments in Ontario, Canada. Our investment strategy is rooted in thorough due diligence, deep local knowledge, and global fund management expertise. We focus on investing in purpose-built residential shovel-ready projects that have undergone extensive planning and permitting. This meticulous approach ensures that our investors benefit from reduced risk and enhanced potential for strong, sustainable returns.

portfolioHead: Explore select opportunities from our investment pipeline

portfolioText: Elite Capital’s portfolio features a curated selection of premium residential developments in key locations across Ontario. We focus on purpose-built projects designed to address the region’s growing housing needs and deliver exceptional risk adjusted returns to our investors.

residentialHead: Canadian residential real estate is an attractive investment opportunity
residentialPara: Canada presents a compelling investment opportunity within the G7, driven by its robust and stable economy, rich natural resources, and exceptional AAA credit rating. This foundation, coupled with a rapidly expanding population and significant housing demand, creates an ideal environment for real estate investment.

features.title: Population surge
features.para: Canada’s population is projected to grow by 6.5 million by 2050, with a compounded annual growth rate of 3%.

features.title: Housing shortage
features.para: A projected deficit of over 3.45 million homes by 2030 underscores the urgent need for new residential development.

features.title: Economic and political stability
features.para: A strong and reliable economy, coupled with a stable political environment, provides a secure foundation for long-term investment.

factorsSub:
These factors make Canada’s residential real estate market exceptionally attractive for investors seeking diversification and good risk adjusted returns.

Our exclusive pipeline of 45+ premium, community-centered developments is strategically located within Ontario, the largest province in Canada by size of the economy and population, capitalising on its dynamic growth and strong market fundamentals.
